PdeEquation.Name: Mps1i
PdeEquation.Rate: ( - J_Mps1i_phos_panCPCa + J_pMps1i_dephos - J_Ndc80_Mps1i_binding - J_pNdc80_Mps1i_binding - J_Mps1i_cis_activation - J_Mps1i_output - J_Mps1i_phos_Plk1a - J_Mps1i_trans_activation)

PdeEquation.Name: pMps1i
PdeEquation.Rate: (J_Mps1i_phos_panCPCa - J_pMps1i_dephos - J_Ndc80_pMps1i_binding - J_pNdc80_pMps1i_binding - J_pMps1_cis_activation + J_Mps1i_phos_Plk1a - J_pMps1i_trans_activation)

PdeEquation.Name: Mps1a
